lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The company has financed a portion of its debt service and other obligations through sales of assets and has relied on short-term waivers from its lenders to prevent defaults on principal and interest payments.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: S. operations are not readily available to help meet those obligations, which include a health care program for retirees and debt service carried over from the larger Allis-Chalmers of earlier years.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: However, the company said, "agreement could not be worked out within the short time frame available, and it was determined that the only practical alternative was to obtain court protection."
